dict.string: This app requires access to the camera to allow you to take photos of their work

We use your location to help you find skilled workers nearby within their working range and provide personalized experiences, timely notifications, and accurate services even when the app is not in use. This ensures that you receive the most relevant information and assistance based on your current location. Additionally, we use your location to ensure your safety by providing real-time updates and emergency assistance if needed

We use your location to help you find skilled workers nearby within their working range and provide personalized experiences, timely notifications, and accurate services even when the app is not in use. This ensures that you receive the most relevant information and assistance based on your current location. Additionally, we use your location to ensure your safety by providing real-time updates and emergency assistance if needed
This app requires access to your photo library to allow you to select and upload photos and videos of their work
